programme.title: Celeste
programme.desc: Living in the lush rainforest of Northern Queensland, a retired opera diva prepares for one final performance. Her late husband's son Jack arrives, haunted by the past, only to discover that Celeste has one last request for him.

programme.title: Light Years (2021)
programme.desc: Three siblings that have grown apart, find themselves forcibly reunited as they need to sell off their childhood home. They embark on a journey to their hometown in their father’s old car, and the road home forces them to confront their buried conflicts.

programme.title: Djam
programme.desc: Djam, a bold young Greek woman, travels to Istanbul to look for an engine part for her uncle’s boat. She meets a stranded and penniless Avril, who is a volunteer for Syrian refugees. Together, they embark on a lively, music-filled journey to Mytilene.

programme.title: Run Woman Run
programme.desc: When a steady diet of donuts, pizza, cake and cigarettes lands Beck in a diabetic coma, she receives a ghostly life coach in the form of legendary marathon hero Tom Longboat who helps her train for the run of her life.

programme.title: My Little Sister
programme.desc: Set in Russia during WWII, little Yamil impatiently awaits the day that his father, whom he has never seen, can return home from battle. One day, mother brings home a traumatized orphan girl Oksana. Yamil finds comfort and hope in loving her as a sister.

programme.title: The Takeover
programme.desc: Cédric works in a company specialized in precision mechanics. Its management, run by an investment fund, is disastrous. As another fund is about to buy it again, Cédric decides to take the company over, giving it to the employees.

programme.title: Ricky
programme.desc: When Katie, an ordinary woman, meets Paco, an ordinary man, something magical and miraculous happens: a love story. From this union will be born an extraordinary baby: Ricky.

programme.title: The Return (2018)
programme.desc: Two Danish-Korean adoptees, Karoline and Thomas, return to their birth country for the first time. The pair meet in Seoul where they encounter fellow adoptees, sparking an emotional journey that challenges their destiny and identity.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Woman On The Train
programme.desc: The reveal of the mysterious, new Chief Inspector receives a lukewarm welcome while the unexpected death of the Commissioner sends shockwaves through the Kiel police. With each new lead, it is clear that the situation may be more complex than it seems.

programme.title: The Boss and The Cutie
programme.desc: Totò is a rising boss of Neopolitan organised crime. Rosetta is a little girl in the fifth grade. After encountering nasty accidents and falling into comas, the both of them wake up in the hospital to find that they are trapped in the other’s body.

programme.title: Margherita Hack - The Lady Of The Stars
programme.desc: The intimate and emotional biography of Italian astrophysicist Margherita Hack, from an independent and curious child to the first female director of the Trieste Astronomical Observatory.

programme.title: Celeste
programme.desc: Living in the lush rainforest of Northern Queensland, a retired opera diva prepares for one final performance. Her late husband's son Jack arrives, haunted by the past, only to discover that Celeste has one last request for him.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Beach Chair Murder
programme.desc: The body of Marion Caspary is found in a beach chair by the sea. Near the scene of the crime, Commissioner Sievers comes across Piet Pinter, an elderly confused gentleman. What connection does he have to the murder?

programme.title: Empty Nets
programme.desc: Amir loves Narges and Narges loves Amir. But their hopes and dreams for a life together collide head on with the web of tradition, corruption, and social hierarchy that continues to rule over the lives of a new generation in Iran.

programme.title: Murders on the Cote Sauvage
programme.desc: Amidst cocaine-laden shores, the discovery of Lagne's body plunges Captain Sarah into a web of intrigue. Together with drugs agent Ben, she navigates dark secrets and treacherous alliances to unveil the truth behind the murders haunting the Côte Sauvage.

programme.title: Abu Omar
programme.desc: Under a strict military curfew Salah, a grieving father, sets out on the road to cross the Israeli border carrying his dead son Omar in a duffel bag. Miri, a pregnant single woman, decides to help him out at all costs while fending off the terrible heat.

programme.title: ONE Friday Fights 96
programme.desc: The world’s largest martial arts organization is bringing another massive double-header to Bangkok, Thailand’s Lumpinee Stadium this weekend - and it all starts with ONE Friday Fights 96. Going down on February 7 live in Asia primetime, the latest installment of the weekly series features nearly a dozen international fighters on the hunt for a lucrative US$100,000 contract with ONE Championship. In the main event, Thailand’s very own Komawut FA Group and Panrit Lukjaomaesaiwaree will rematch in what’s expected to be a thrilling 142-pound catchweight Muay Thai outing. Komawut is looking to score another victory over Panrit and prove his majority decision win last time was no fluke. Panrit, though, wants to earn one back over his compatriot and even up their series. Elsewhere, Italy’s Alessio Malatesta meets Russia’s Abdulla Dayakaev in a bantamweight Muay Thai tussle, while contracted fighter Hyu from Japan welcomes Portugal’s Leandro Miranda to ONE Friday Fights in flyweight kickbox...

programme.title: ONE Fight Night 28: Prajanchai vs. Barboza
programme.desc: After kicking off the year with two awe-inspiring blockbuster events, the world’s largest martial arts organization will keep the fire burning with ONE Fight Night 28: Prajanchai vs. Barboza, which broadcasts live from Bangkok, Thailand’s Lumpinee Stadium on Friday, February 7. In the headline attraction, two of the most dangerous strawweight knockout artists on the planet will go head-to-head for Muay Thai gold. Fresh off his landmark ONE Strawweight Kickboxing World Title victory, defending two-sport king Prajanchai PK Saenchai will make his highly anticipated return to the ring and look to continue building his case as the greatest striker the division has ever seen. But standing across from him in the ONE Strawweight Muay Thai World Title main event will be Ellis Badr Barboza, a lethal 24-year-old British bruiser who may have the skills, power, and cardio to dethrone Prajanchai in front of his hometown crowd.
